verses.verse: And the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, prophesy <WH5012> against the prophets <WH5030> of Israel <WH3478> that prophesy <WH5012>, and say <WH559> you unto them that prophesy <WH5030> out of their own hearts <WH3820>, Hear <WH8085> you the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068>;
Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; Woe <WH1945> unto the foolish <WH5036> prophets <WH5030>, that follow <WH1980> their own spirit <WH7307>, and have seen nothing <WH7200>!
O Israel <WH3478>, your prophets <WH5030> are like the foxes <WH7776> in the deserts <WH2723>.

You have not gone up <WH5927> into the gaps <WH6556>, neither made up <WH1443> the hedge <WH1447> for the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> to stand <WH5975> in the battle <WH4421> in the day <WH3117> of the Lord <WH3068>.

They have seen <WH2372> vanity <WH7723> and lying <WH3577> divination <WH7081>, saying <WH559>, The Lord <WH3068> says <WH5002>: and the Lord <WH3068> has not sent <WH7971> them <WH3176>: and they have made others to hope that they would confirm <WH6965> the word <WH1697>.

Have you not seen <WH2372> a vain <WH7723> vision <WH4236>, and have you not spoken <WH1696> a lying <WH3577> divination <WH4738>, whereas you say <WH559>, The Lord <WH3068> says <WH5002> it <WH559>; although I have not spoken?

Therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; Because you have spoken <WH1696> vanity <WH7723>, and seen <WH2372> lies <WH3577>, therefore <WH5002>, behold, I am against you, says the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>.

And my hand <WH3027> shall be upon the prophets <WH5030> that see <WH2374> vanity <WH7723>, and that divine <WH7080> lies <WH3577>: they shall not be in the assembly <WH5475> of my people <WH5971>, neither shall they be written <WH3789> in the writing <WH3791> of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, neither shall they enter <WH935> into the land <WH127> of Israel <WH3478>; and you shall know <WH3045> that I am the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>.

Because <WH2937>, even because they have seduced my people <WH5971>, saying <WH559>, Peace <WH7965>; and there was no peace <WH7965>; and one built up <WH1129> a wall <WH2434>, and <WH2009>, behold, others coated <WH2902> it with untempered mortar <WH8602>:

Say <WH559> unto them which daub <WH2902> it with untempered <WH8602> mortar <WH5307>, that it shall fall: there shall be a overflowing <WH7857> shower <WH1653>; and you <WH859>, O great hailstones <WH417>, shall fall <WH5307>; and a stormy <WH5591> wind <WH7307> shall tear it <WH1234>.
Behold <WH7023>, when the wall is fallen <WH5307>, shall it not be said <WH559> unto you <WH2915>, Where is the daubing with which you have coated it <WH2902>?

Therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; I will even tear <WH1234> it with a stormy <WH5591> wind <WH7307> in my fury <WH2534>; and there shall be a overflowing <WH7857> shower <WH1653> in my anger <WH639>, and great hailstones <WH417> in my fury <WH2534> to consume it <WH3617>.

So will I break down <WH2040> the wall <WH7023> that you have coated <WH2902> with untempered <WH8602> mortar <WH5060>, and bring it down to the ground <WH776>, so that the foundation <WH3247> there shall be discovered <WH1540>, and it shall fall <WH5307>, and you shall be consumed <WH3615> in the midst <WH8432> there <WH3045>: and you shall know that I am the Lord <WH3068>.

Thus will I accomplish <WH3615> my wrath <WH2534> upon the wall <WH7023>, and upon them that have coated <WH2902> it with untempered <WH8602> mortar <WH559>, and will say unto you <WH7023>, The wall is no more <WH2902>, neither they that coated it;

To know <WH5030>, the prophets of Israel <WH3478> which prophesy <WH5012> concerning Jerusalem <WH3389>, and which see <WH2374> visions <WH2377> of peace <WH7965> for her <WH7965>, and there is no peace, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>.

Likewise <WH1121>, you son of man <WH120>, set <WH7760> your face <WH6440> against the daughters <WH1323> of your people <WH5971>, which prophesy <WH5012> out of their own heart <WH3820>; and prophesy you against them <WH5012>,

And say <WH559>, Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; Woe <WH1945> to the women that sew <WH8609> pillows <WH3704> to all armholes <WH679>, and make <WH6213> kerchiefs <WH4555> upon the head <WH7218> of every stature <WH6967> to hunt <WH6679> souls <WH5315>! Will you hunt <WH6679> the souls <WH5315> of my people <WH5971>, and will you save <WH2421> the souls <WH5315> alive that come unto you <WH2421>?

And will you pollute <WH2490> me among my people <WH5971> for handfuls <WH8168> of barley <WH8184> and for pieces <WH6595> of bread <WH3899>, to kill <WH4191> the souls <WH5315> that should not die <WH4191>, and to save <WH2421> the souls <WH5315> alive <WH2421> that should not live <WH2421>, by your lying <WH3576> to my people <WH5971> that hear <WH8085> your lies <WH3577>?

Therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3069>; Behold <WH3704>, I am against your pillows, with which you <WH859> there hunt <WH6679> the souls <WH5315> to make them fly <WH6524>, and I will tear <WH7167> them from your arms <WH2220>, and will let the souls <WH5315> go <WH7971>, even the souls <WH5315> that you hunt <WH6679> to make them fly <WH6524>.

Your kerchiefs <WH4555> also will I tear <WH7167>, and deliver <WH5337> my people <WH5971> out of your hand <WH3027>, and they shall be no more in your hand <WH3027> to be hunted <WH4686>; and you shall know <WH3045> that I am the Lord <WH3068>.

Because with lies <WH8267> you have made the heart <WH3820> of the righteous <WH6662> sad <WH3512>, whom I have not made sad <WH3510>; and strengthened <WH2388> the hands <WH3027> of the wicked <WH7451>, that he should not return <WH7725> from his wicked <WH7563> way <WH1870>, by promising him life <WH2421>:

Therefore you shall see <WH2372> no more vanity <WH7723>, nor divine <WH7080> divinations <WH7081>: for I will deliver <WH5337> my people <WH5971> out of your hand <WH3027>: and you shall know <WH3045> that I am the Lord <WH3068>.
